segments.text: नमस्ते दोस्तों, आज मैं आपको batane wala hu ki paise kaise kamaye
पहला तरीका है online freelancing, जहाँ आप अपनी skills से पैसा कमा सकते हो
दूसरा तरीका है content creation, जैसे YouTube videos बनाना
तीसरा तरीका है e-commerce, अपना online store खोलो
चौथा है investing, stocks और mutual funds में पैसा लगाओ
पांचवा है cryptocurrency, लेकिन ये risky है
तो दोस्तों ये थे कुछ तरीके पैसे कमाने के, video अच्छी लगी तो like करो

clips.description: Person sitting alone in dark room looking at laptop screen with bills scattered on desk, conveying financial stress
Money and coins being poured from above in slow motion against plain background showing abundance
Close-up of young professional typing on laptop at modern cafe workspace
Digital trading dashboard showing stock charts and cryptocurrency prices with green/red indicators
Hand placing coins in piggy bank or cash jar showing savings concept
Someone scrolling through mobile apps, possibly fintech or payment apps
